title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
OB: The error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is displayed when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: The class hierarchies of the internal jars are not displayed when using F4 on a binary project selection.
SR: Provide a clear error message that explains what 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' means and how to resolve it. Additionally, display the class hierarchies of the internal jars when using F4 on a binary project selection.
